actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to make parallel the exemption from lottery prohibitions granted to newspapers and radio and television.

summary.text: Applies the exemption from lottery prohibitions granted to newspapers publish in a States which conducts a lottery to newpapers in adjacent States which conduct such a lottery. (Amends 18 U. S. C. 1307(a)(1))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to make parallel the exemption from lottery prohibitions granted to newspapers and radio and television.
